programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata puķītes Zilo Atsperīgo, Margriezīti un Mazo Rozīti, lai Isa varētu doties uz karalisku tējas pēcpusdienu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz mazajai Andreai atrast burvju lapu, kas ļauj alebrihei saņemt maģiskās spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sadraudzējas ar kāpuru, kā arī kopā ar Džūdiju uzzina, ka visas pārmaiņas nav sliktas. Brauni piedalās ļoti azartiskā spēlē "Grīda ir lava", bet kurš uzvarēs? Ko par viņiem domās svarīgs viesis?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pievienojieties Padingtonam, kurš kļūst par pirmo lāčunautu, pateicoties Braunu ģimenei. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons salasa dārzā visas kazenes, bet Karija kungs uzskata, ka dažas pienākas viņam. Vai tā ir jāatdod?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Bērdas kundzes diena, un Padingtons grib izmantot tortē marmelādi no īpašās burkas, taču neviens to nespēj atvērt. Kā viņš izrādīs pateicību? Padingtons un Mateo nodibina galda tenisa komandu un pārspēj huligānus, lai spēlēt varētu visi.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoras parkā notiks ikgadējais jautrais skrējiens, bet Padingtons nav formā, tāpēc Bērdas kundze izlemj trenēt viņu. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons nejauši salauž Bērdas kundzes šūpuļkrēslu. Kā viņi to salabos, lai viņa neuzzinātu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kurš grib nozagt Karija kunga augstu vērtēto milzu ķirbi? Izmeklē policists Velss un Padingtons. Parkā ir slidotava, un Grūbera kungs māca Padingtonam slidot pirms ledus diskotēkas. Vai pašam pietiks drosmes kāpt uz ledus pēc kritiena?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Laipnais lāčuks Padingtons pārvācas uz Londonu pēc tam, kad zemestrīce iznīcina viņa mājokli. Te viņš apmetas uz dzīvi pie Braunu ģimenes – Henrija, Mērijas, Džūdijas un Džonatana. Kaimiņos viņiem dzīvo īgnais Karija kungs, kuram enerģiskais lācēns diez ko nepatīk. Padingtons katru dienu raksta vēstules savai tantei Lūsijai, kurās stāsta par dienas piedzīvojumiem un pārsteigumiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļas Ziemassvētki
programme.desc: Rabls nevar sagaidīt, kad pienāks Ziemassvētki, jo viņš cer, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis uzdāvinās viņam lāzerurbi. Kad mērs Hamdingers uzzina, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis ir saaukstējies, viņš izlemj paņemt visas dāvanas sev.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Šodien būs pirmā skolas diena... Ja Rabla komanda pabeigs būvēt skolu! Bebrs grib visu ūdeni savākt sev, tāpēc komandai jāizdomā, kā glābt Zojas augus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Santaklausam atgūt Garnadža nočieptās kamanas un nogādāt dāvanas visiem Lietusmeža iemītniekiem. Dora izglābj Ziemassvētkus! Dora satiek mākonīti Koldu un palīdz viņai šķērsot mežu un atgriezties mājās - Sniega kalnā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakarā Rabls ar komandu saņem zvanu no Ziemassvētku vecīša. Viņam vajadzīga palīdzība, lai pagūtu uztaisīt rotaļlietas uz Ziemassvētkiem! Taču, kad Ātrmeistars to noklausās un cenšas tēlot varoni, Rablam un suņiem jāglābj Ziemassvētki.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēnu iemīļotajām grāmatām iznācis turpinājums! Tām nav vietas bibliotēkā, tāpēc kucēniem jābūt radošiem!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dorai uzdāvina kucēnu, bet kaķītis Lakijs kļūst greizsirdīgs un aizbēg no mājām. Dora dodas viņam atgādināt, ka visi viņu ļoti mīl. Svarīgas čempionāta spēles dienā visi Doras draugi sasirgst ar šķavām. Dora palīdz komandai izveseļoties!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu.

programme.title: Alberts
programme.desc: Alberts, maza eglīte, kura ir sajūsmā par Ziemassvētkiem, dodas ceļā no stādu audzētavas uz lielpilsētu, lai piepildītu savus sapņus.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz pelēnam Peresam salabot burvju zobu suku, lai varētu saņemt dāvanu par savu izkritušo zobu. Dora iepazīstas ar kāpuru Karlosu, kurš vēlas kļūt pr tauriņu! Lai tas notiktu, draugiem viņam jāatrod sviestogu cienasts.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Santaklausam atgūt Garnadža nočieptās kamanas un nogādāt dāvanas visiem Lietusmeža iemītniekiem. Dora izglābj Ziemassvētkus! Dora satiek mākonīti Koldu un palīdz viņai šķērsot mežu un atgriezties mājās - Sniega kalnā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Grūbera kungs izdara labu Padingtonam un saka, ka viņš var pateikties, izdarot labu kādam citam. Tas ir grūtāk nekā izklausās! Padingtons uzzina par kompostēšanu, pateicoties Mulča kungam. Vai viņš paspēs izaudzēt puķes tantei Lūsijai?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons mācās par bitēm un nolemj palīdzēt tām ražot medu, iestādot puķes, bet kāds domā, ka tās ir nezāles! Vindzoras dārzos ir karstuma vilnis, Mateo izpārdevis visus saldējumus, tāpēc viņš kopā ar Padingtonu rada jaunu garšu!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons priecājas par pilsētas saimniecības atklāšanu, bet dzīvnieki aizbēg, kad viņš atstāj vaļā vārtus. Vai dzīvniekus pagūs atrast? Bāzs māca Džonatanam un Padingtonam par atkārtoto izmantošanu. Vai par veikumu viņi saņems balvu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija raizējas, ka izsmēluši suņa Lakija veiksmi. Kā viņi pateiks to Sofijai? Pie Bāza ciemojas brāļameita Simija. Viņš grib pārsteigt meiteni ar ideālu picu, bet tas nebūs viegli izsalkušo dzīvnieku dēļ.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija burtiski pazaudē zobu. Vai to atradīs pirms likšanās uz auss, un vai zobu fejai garšos marmelāde? Padingtons kļūst par darba lāci un palīdz Brauna kungam mājas birojā, bet uzzina, ka datori mēdz niķoties.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauniem ir jauni kaimiņi, un Toka stāsta, ka dārzā ir goblins, un viņas tētis ir astronauts! Tā taču nav tiesa, vai ne? Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija nolēmuši veidot avīzi, bet viņiem vajag stāstu titullapai!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rivera grib uzņemt krītošas zvaigznes foto, tāpēc kucēni ceļ observatoriju. Kucēni apmaldās uz dabas takas un rod veidu, kā nokļūt mājās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Suņi uzzina, ka Celtne ir slepena skeitošanas zvaigzne! Bet, būvējot skeitparku, viņiem jārisina problēma ar cementa maisījumu. // Pilsētā ieradīsies Čārdžera mīļākā dziedātāja Sjerra Spīdošā... Ja suņi spēs uzbūvēt tuneli viņas turnejas autobusam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Laipnais lāčuks Padingtons pārvācas uz Londonu pēc tam, kad zemestrīce iznīcina viņa mājokli. Te viņš apmetas uz dzīvi pie Braunu ģimenes – Henrija, Mērijas, Džūdijas un Džonatana. Kaimiņos viņiem dzīvo īgnais Karija kungs, kuram enerģiskais lācēns diez ko nepatīk. Padingtons katru dienu raksta vēstules savai tantei Lūsijai, kurās stāsta par dienas piedzīvojumiem un pārsteigumiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Notiek Vindzoru dārzu dzīvnieku izstāde, Padingtons ir tiesnesis. Visi ir tik talantīgi, kā viņam izvēlēties? / Padingtons, Džūdija un Džonatans atklāj, ka spēlēties ar kaimiņiem ir jautrāk, nekā censties pārspēt, kaut arī Toks zog idejas!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Laipnais lāčuks Padingtons pārvācas uz Londonu pēc tam, kad zemestrīce iznīcina viņa mājokli. Te viņš apmetas uz dzīvi pie Braunu ģimenes – Henrija, Mērijas, Džūdijas un Džonatana. Kaimiņos viņiem dzīvo īgnais Karija kungs, kuram enerģiskais lācēns diez ko nepatīk. Padingtons katru dienu raksta vēstules savai tantei Lūsijai, kurās stāsta par dienas piedzīvojumiem un pārsteigumiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons palīdz izperēt olu, bet ir jāgaida ļoti ilgi. Kad tā beidzot izšķiļas, viņš tiek pie pārsteiguma! Padingtons vēlas, kaut varētu piedalīties Braunu kāzās, apskatot fotogrāfijas, un viņi nolemj to visu atkārtot!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kungs grib kļūt par līderi un izveidot dabas klubu, lai atstātu iespaidu uz Potsa kundzi. Vai viņa fakti ir pareizi? Padingtons nokrīt un zaudē savu rāpšanās pašapziņu. Bez rāpšanās viņš nejūtas kā savā ādā - ko viņš var darīt?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džonatans ar Padingtonu ezerā atrod dārgumu karti! Arī Džūdija un Toks tādu atrod. Kuri atradīs dārgumus pirmie? Grūbera kungs vienmēr gribējis doties uz Itāliju, Padingtons apņēmies palīdzēt piepildīt drauga sapni.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: WITS Academy
programme.desc: Now a Guardian in training at WITS Academy, the Magic Realms most esteemed school for Witches and Wizards in Training, it seems like Andis dream has finally come true. But as the best friend and unofficial Guardian to the Chosen One, shell have to work hard to prove that she can live up to expectations as the first (and only) human Guardian. Plus, shes in charge of getting the Magical Realms toughest witch and wizard to graduation day, one of which is Jaxs little sister Jessie! Along the way shell have to decide who is a friend, who is a foe and who may be more...

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Tired of SpongeBobs chaotic driving, Mrs. Puff sends him away to Klopnod on an exchange student driver program. In return, she receives Peppercorn, a sea-mule, who is an excellent driver! Meanwhile, SpongeBob learns that his frenzied driving skills are perfectly suited for the Klopnodian roads (where only farm animals are allowed to drive). However, SpongeBobs newfound Klopnodian driving skills do not translate well upon returning to Bikini Bottom. // Slappy becomes a waiter at the Krusty Krab but scares off customers with his creepy demeanor. He promises Mr. Krabs that his monster friends will be coming to dine that night. Later, the restaurant is packed with monsters and Krabs is thrilled! However, Nosferatu arrives and begs Slappy to return as his servant. Slappy agrees, to Mr. Krabs disappointment - he loved the business the monsters brought in! In the end, however, he realizes that monsters pay in bugs, not cash!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works in To Dad and Back, then in Survivoring, Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV. Kamp Koral The Jellyfish Kid. A young SpongeBob is determined to catch his first jellyfish, so his friends do whatever they can to help him.

programme.title: Santa Hunters
programme.desc: Family movie. Nine year old Alex knows that Santa is real and he is determined to prove it. Alex, his cousin Zoey and their family rig up and elaborate set of traps and video equipment to catch Santa in action on Christmas Eve night.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: With only a few weeks left of summer, Lil has a genius idea: the family must visit her favorite theme park, Lake World, before Jack leaves! But when they arrive, its clearly less magical than Lil remembered: the fish dogs are droopy, the coaster aint coastin, the all-you-can-eat shrimp buffet is kaput. Jacks more interested in filming the janky park - frustrating Lil, who wants him to enjoy the day with his eyeballs. She consoles herself that the parks BEST ride will make up for the disappointing day. But when they get to where the ride should be, its gone! Devastated, Lil blames Jack for the horrid day, and they get in a bad fight. Back at the hotel that night, still mad at each other, the kids cant help but piece together clues hinting that the Otter Side might still be in the park... They have to find it! The kids must sneak past vengeful security guards and chaotic mazes to find the mythical ride, leading to an adventure neither of them expected.

programme.title: Santa Hunters
programme.desc: Family movie. Nine year old Alex knows that Santa is real and he is determined to prove it. Alex, his cousin Zoey and their family rig up and elaborate set of traps and video equipment to catch Santa in action on Christmas Eve night.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Ellie and the kids investigate cryptic Mrs. Withers. When Jack goes missing in her creepy home, Ellie and Lil must save him! // Eager to become Master Criminals, Lil and Jack help Chuck with his "dirty laundry". But are they ready for a life of crime?

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When Leonardo finds himself the accidental hero in a subway station, saving the lives of innocent bystanders, hes thrilled by the title of HERO. This pushes him to a life of crime-fighting vigilantism, starting with putting the Purple Dragons in their place. But when hes caught on camera and his brothers and April see this Turtle-shaped hero on the news, they interrogate him: whats he up to... and can they get in on it? Now, the four Night Ninjas and April suit up and set out to rid the streets of crime in a single night. Now whats left to do? April finds a dog-napping ring thats been snatching up purebreds. Baiting the dog-nappers with a fancy pooch, the Turtles track the criminals and meet the villainous French florist known as... La Fleur! She and her band of hench-florists are using the dog-napping as a cover-up for a much larger crime. And when the Night Ninjas show up to stop her, it may be too late for Leo and his brothers as the whole thing goes up in flames... literally.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: WITS Academy
programme.desc: Now a Guardian in training at WITS Academy, the Magic Realms most esteemed school for Witches and Wizards in Training, it seems like Andis dream has finally come true. But as the best friend and unofficial Guardian to the Chosen One, shell have to work hard to prove that she can live up to expectations as the first (and only) human Guardian. Plus, shes in charge of getting the Magical Realms toughest witch and wizard to graduation day, one of which is Jaxs little sister Jessie! Along the way shell have to decide who is a friend, who is a foe and who may be more...

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Its a busy day at the laundromat! While Squidward struggles to scrub a stubborn stain out of his shirt, we see other Bikini Bottomites tending to their laundry as well - including Plankton, who is using a washing machine to clean up some laboratory equipment. Turns out, the equipment is covered in leftover mutation formula which causes the washing machine to mutate into a raging monster! After it terrorizes the patrons, Squidwards tough stain defeats the monster and everyone celebrates with a song! // SpongeBob goes to Old Man Jenkins farm and finds Patrick watching over Old Man Jenkins prized worm hog, Beulah... who has suddenly gone missing! Furious, Old Man Jenkins sets out with them to find her. After a long fruitless search, Old Man Jenkins turns on them! SpongeBob and Patrick hide out inside Old Man Jenkins beard, but Old Man Jenkins tries to smoke them out, starting a fire! Just in time, Beulah returns and saves them! She wasnt lost, she took herself to the county fair and won first prize!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its time for the Great Smurf Games in the village! The big prize? A magical sphere that grants all the members of the winning team one wish of their choice. Clumsy sees this as the perfect opportunity to become Agile Smurf, but no one wants to team up with him. Gargamel is also looking forward to the games because he wants to use the sphere to capture all the Smurfs! Hes well prepared and has set up traps all over the forest. The Great Games start with the traditional relay race. During the race, Storm and Grouchy are captured by Gargamel, who learns that only one Smurf who wins the Great Games will get a wish. So, he decides to send Dwayne and Rowena to take part in the Games, disguised as Storm and Grouchy. They go looking for the magical sphere, that has now been taken by Clumsy. They offer to team up with him, to his great surprise...

programme.title: Tiny Christmas
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a clumsy elf accidentally shrinks down two kids into mini-size. The kids are scooped up into Santas sack and dropped off across the street at their neighbors house. In order to make it home for Christmas (just one house away!), the tiny kids have to work together to navigate holiday hazards

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe start the process to impress Captain Perfect and save their mission, but they clash over their different styles. As Max sees that Phoebe worked better with Captain Perfect, he decides that he will also be better off with a new partner, and summons his friend Gideon from Hiddenville. Gideon doesnt fit the superhero mold, however, so Max uses one of his gadgets to give him size and strength. But the setting is off, and Max shrinks Gideon to the size of an ant, forcing him to locate and save his impossible-to-see friend before Phoebe and Captain Perfect discover what hes done. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Booch and Jinx to try their best to bond with new crush BC, so they pretend to be wealthy like his family.

But when hes caught on camera and his brothers and April see this Turtle-shaped hero on the news, they interrogate him: whats he up to... and can they get in on it? Now, the four Night Ninjas and April suit up and set out to rid the streets of crime in a single night. Now whats left to do? April finds a dog-napping ring thats been snatching up purebreds. Baiting the dog-nappers with a fancy pooch, the Turtles track the criminals and meet the villainous French florist known as... La Fleur! She and her band of hench-florists are using the dog-napping as a cover-up for a much larger crime. And when the Night Ninjas show up to stop her, it may be too late for Leo and his brothers as the whole thing goes up in flames... literally.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Danger Force

They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: In order to help Scaredy to overcome his fear of pretty much everything, Blossom, Hefty and Smurfette organize a trip into the forest for him. But as theyre exploring, their car breaks down. While Hefty is trying to fix the car, Blossom suggests the others explore a cave but they disturb a mother spider who is not happy to see them! Time to run! Scaredy overcomes all of his fears to save his friends and proves just how brave he actually is. // Baby Smurf is having fun with Painters paint on one of his canvases and everyone in the village thinks the paintings are amazing. Not wanting to admit that the paintings arent his, Painter has to find a way of reproducing Baby Smurfs style, but its proving very hard to do. So he lets Baby Smurf express himself freely, whilst still pretending that the paintings were his. Hes put on the spot when he has to create a fresco in front of the whole village ... and then he finally has to admit that Baby Smurf is actually the artist.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf is returning from an expedition to find rare ingredients when one of them is accidentally eaten by one of Farmers snails. A few days later, Brainy is attacked by a creature that turns him into a zombie, and soon the whole village is contaminated. Lily and Farmer have to work together to find the monster and give it the antidote that will save the village! // Gargamel strikes a deal with Rowena: he will take her to see her favorite singer in concert and she will accept to be turned into the Smurfette so that he can trick his mother, who thinks hes completely useless. But as soon as she sees her, Granny is reminded of her childhood doll and falls under her spell. Meanwhile, in the forest, the real Smurfette is rehearsing a play with Dimwitty and Poet when both Smurfettes switch places by accident: Rowena is now acting in the play for Poet and Smurfette ends up at Gargamels hovel..

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

Can the Penguins stop her before she destroys the city? Smotherly Love: Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home during a battle with Hans the Puffin. She smothers the penguins with love and nurturing, and gets her new boys to behave by playing possum whenever necessary. The battle-hardened unit devolves into a bunch of softies, opening the door for Hans to take advantage. It looks like he has the upper wing, unless someone can make a play to stop him!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The zoosters think King Julien has caused sweet old lady Gladys to slip and hurt herself, thus cutting off the special treats she brings for them. The rush to judgment condemns the protesting lemur to a mighty swat from the Rump Whomper. As the clock winds down to his unspeakable punishment only one abstains - Skippers gut inexplicably insists that King Julien is innocent. You should know better than to go against your gut. // Kowalskis dream of attending the giant invention expo INVEXPO have to be put on hold when hes laid up with broken legs. Skipper and the rest of the gang go in his place with the promise to bring him a full report. The injured bird goes stir crazy locked away in the hospital, however, and hallucinates that a dangerous Space Squid is invading! Could this be more than the fevered imaginings of the caged bird?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper: Its off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. Private, Rico, and Kowalski battle their way to a fish packing plant where they discover Officer X has become Fishmonger X. The deranged X sniffs out the fighting penguins, capturing them and hauling them off to the pokey. Can they rediscover the teamwork they had forsaken in order to escape? High Moltage: The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action stars blockbuster movie! Private, however, has an itchy problem - hes turned hideous because hes molting! The penguins need his hypercute powers to knock Alice out and disengage her new zoo security system. The despondent bird does all he can to reconstruct his cuteness, but sadly his hypercute powers distort to cause a hyperalarming, hypervomitous mess!

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Best breaks the last clean plate, rather than do the dishes, Best and Bester head out to buy a brand new one. // Best and Bester decide to make the best milkshake ever, only to find themselves in a bitter contest with Flip Flop.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bettervale is celebrating "Better Day" but Best and Bester manage to anger the townsfolk by causing mischief again. // After a period of exile Best and Bester return hoping to patch things up with their neighbours and with each other.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this years Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other peoples ideas even if they havent got a war room.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: This animated comedy show follows the outrageous and often gross-out antics of a enthusiastic and curious 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel and his best friend and a master of disguise, a talking snake named Craig. These two are match made in heaven as they find themselves in crazy and hilarious situations every day in their home town of Lundgren. They complete each other and together they are ready to face any challenges and difficulties that life has ahead for them.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents

Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.
